results.description: Use news_pct_1min to capture immediate continuation. SUGGESTION1: used single high-signal field (news_pct_1min) for clarity; SUGGESTION2: not applicable (scalar field); SUGGESTION3: coverage is 0.9717 (>0.6) so ts_backfill not needed; SUGGESTION4: news_pct_1min has reasonable user/alpha counts, so favored. Confidence set to 0.70.

Short-term mean-reversion: negative of 1-minute move. SUGGESTION1: single field for focused signal; SUGGESTION2: not applicable; SUGGESTION3: coverage OK so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: uses popular field. Confidence 0.55 because short-term noise.

Exploit 5-minute drift using news_pct_5_min. SUGGESTION1: one field chosen for timeliness; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.774 so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: moderate user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.66.

Capture half-hour continuation with news_pct_30min. SUGGESTION1: single reliable field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9717 so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: field has decent adoption. Confidence 0.72.
Use news_pct_60min to capture sustained moves. SUGGESTION1: single field for parsimony; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9692 so ok; SUGGESTION4: adequate user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Volume spike normalized: current vs 30-day average

Use news_vol_stddev to detect abnormal volume. SUGGESTION1: single high-coverage field (0.9672); SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed; SUGGESTION4: field has good alphaCount. Confidence 0.70.

Use news_atr_ratio to capture range expansion. SUGGESTION1: single field for clarity; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.7967 (>0.6) so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: high user/alpha counts support signal. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Pre vs post session VWAP dislocation
results.description: Signal is post_vwap - pre_vwap to capture price drift vs early auction. SUGGESTION1: used two VWAP fields (news_post_vwap, news_pre_vwap); SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.7 so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: both have decent adoption. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: EOD VWAP gap from news time
results.description: Measure (eod_vwap - ton_last)/ton_last to capture trader impact. SUGGESTION1: two fields (news_eod_vwap, news_ton_last); SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: good alpha counts. Confidence 0.60.

Contrarian trade on extreme PE: reverse z-score of news_pe_ratio. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9662 no backfill; SUGGESTION4: high userCount suggests robust factor. Confidence 0.62.

High news_short_interest predicts upward pressure. SUGGESTION1: single field (short_interest); SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.872 so OK; SUGGESTION4: moderate user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.58.

Scale momentum by size: ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)/sqrt(news_cap). SUGGESTION1: used two fields (momentum and cap) to combine signals; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage for news_cap high (0.8272) so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: news_cap high user count supports use. Confidence 0.61.

When low excursion is extreme, expect bounce: reverse z-score of news_low_exc_stddev. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9707; SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Confidence 0.60.

Use news_max_up_ret to pick names that already rallied after news and continue. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.8458 (>0.6) no backfill; SUGGESTION4: good alphaCount. Confidence 0.58.
Mean-revert after large down-move using news_max_dn_ret and reverse z-score. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9704; SUGGESTION4: decent counts. Confidence 0.6.

Use news_indx_perf to find stocks that outperformed the index on news and continue. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9713; SUGGESTION4: solid alphaCount. Confidence 0.64.

Ratio news_mins_1_chg / news_mins_5_chg to detect rapid moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields used to capture velocity; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: both have coverage >0.7; SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Quick up-move detection (short minutes to 1% up)

Use news_range_stddev to capture unusual intraday range. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.6172 (~0.62) ok; SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Confidence 0.59.

news_tot_ticks indicates activity; momentum in ticks predicts price moves. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9691; SUGGESTION4: strong user/alpha counts (673/1422). Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: ATR to volume anomaly (volatility adjusted activity)
results.description: Divide atr_ratio by vol_stddev to find volatility-adjusted range moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields (news_atr_ratio, news_vol_stddev); SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.7 so no backfill; SUGGESTION4: both widely used. Confidence 0.60.

Multiply open gap by curr/mov volume ratio (simplified: use open_gap and news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION1: two fields to confirm gap with volume; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: news_ratio_vol coverage 0.5122 (<0.6) so apply backfill; SUGGESTION4: open_gap has moderate counts. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: High ticks but low volume ratio (algorithmic liquidity pickup)

Use news_pct_30min after earnings-related news to capture drift. SUGGESTION1: single field selected; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: targeted to earnings days. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Open auction imbalance: ton_last vs dayopen
results.description: Compare news_ton_last and news_open to find auction gaps: subtract(news_open,news_ton_last). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage OK; SUGGESTION4: open has moderate counts. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Slow drift momentum: 120min with TS IR filter

results.idea: Short-term reversal by minute-count to down move

Favor momentum only in large caps: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),ts_zscore(news_cap)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: cap coverage high; SUGGESTION4: cap has very high userCount, aiding stability. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Pre-news volatility low + big immediate up => follow-through
results.description: If pre-news range small but 1min up large expect continuation: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_1min),reverse(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(news_ton_high,5)))). Reverse pct_30min but scale by 1/cap to overweight small names: multiply(reverse(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)),inverse(add(1,news_cap))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverages OK; SUGGESTION4: aims to exploit weaker liquidity. Confidence 0.47.

Combine 5min and 30min momentum after eps_actual: add(ts_zscore(news_eps_actual),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverages high; SUGGESTION4: targets earnings flow. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Post-news momentum filtered by PE low (value bias)

results.idea: High pre-news ticks then down move â€” short continuation

results.idea: Post-news momentum weighted by eod_high excursion

results.idea: Post-news move scaled by market cap percentile
results.description: Quantile-normalize cap and use to scale momentum: divide(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),quantile(news_cap)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: quantile uses high-coverage cap; SUGGESTION4: robust scaling. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Fade after extreme minute-count to up move (slow climb)

results.idea: Momentum confirmed by high 30min pct and low prevday volatility
results.description: Multiply pct_30min zscore with inverse of prevday range stddev: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),inverse(add(1,ts_backfill(news_rangestddev,5)))). results.idea: Short-term reversal using minute buckets 3 and 5
results.description: If 3-min move large but 5-min smaller => mean-revert: subtract(ts_zscore(news_mins_3_chg),ts_zscore(news_mins_5_chg)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverages ~0.917/0.967 so OK; SUGGESTION4: captures decelerating moves. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Earnings beat + low short interest = sustained uptrend

results.idea: Large intraday range then momentum continuation
results.description: Multiply pct_60min zscore by range_amt zscore: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_60min),ts_zscore(news_session_range)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: news_session_range coverage 0.4236 so ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4: targets big-range moves. Confidence 0.47.

If 1-minute move persists into EOD, favor continuation: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_1min),ts_zscore(subtract(news_eod_close,news_ton_last))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: high coverage; SUGGESTION4: end-of-day confirmation. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Pre-news price high vs vwap continuation
results.description: If TONLast > main_vwap and momentum positive, expect continuation: multiply(ts_zscore(subtract(news_ton_last,news_main_vwap)),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: main_vwap coverage 0.9707; SUGGESTION4: auction-aware. Confidence 0.56.
Winsorize pct_30min then zscore to reduce outlier impact. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: robustification applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large after-news high relative to TONLast
results.description: If EODHigh far above TONLast, expect mean-reversion: reverse(ts_zscore(news_high_exc_stddev)). SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: classic reversion. Confidence 0.57.

Use ts_arg_max(news_pct_30min,d) to detect when current day has recent max acceleration (favor momentum). SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: time-positioning. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for prev close gap
results.description: Divide pct_30min zscore by (1+abs(open_gap)) to reduce large-gap noise: divide(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),add(1,abs(news_open_gap))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: open_gap coverage ~0.62; SUGGESTION4: stabilizes signal. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Post-news continuation in names with growing relative volume
results.description: Use vol ratio (curr/mov) and pct_30min together: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),ts_zscore(ts_backfill(divide(news_curr_vol,news_mov_vol),5))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: ratio coverage <0.6 so backfilled; SUGGESTION4: volume-confirmed momentum. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Microstructure fade: high ticks but low pct_30min => fade
results.description: If ticks high but price hasn't moved, expect mean reversion: subtract(ts_zscore(news_tot_ticks),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: both coverages high; SUGGESTION4: microstructure use. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Post-news momentum scaled by provider novelty
results.description: Boost signal when provider indicates first report (nws12_mainz_newrecord): multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),nws12_mainz_newrecord). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: newrecord coverage 0.9741; SUGGESTION4: novelty emphasis. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Intraday continuation filtered by short interest low
results.description: Prefer momentum when short_interest low: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),inverse(add(1,news_short_interest))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: short_interest coverage 0.872; SUGGESTION4: borrow-aware. Confidence 0.56.

Reverse when max_up_ret is large to capture profit-taking: reverse(ts_zscore(news_max_up_ret)). SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9692; SUGGESTION4: intuitive. Confidence 0.52.

If pre_vwap < TONLast and breakout exists, follow: multiply(reverse(ts_zscore(subtract(news_pre_vwap,news_ton_last))),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverages OK; SUGGESTION4: market micro structure aware. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings momentum filtered by low volatility
results.description: Multiply eps_actual zscore by inverse vol_stddev to favor stable names with beat: multiply(ts_zscore(news_eps_actual),inverse(add(1,news_vol_stddev))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: both high coverage; SUGGESTION4: risk-managed earnings trades. Confidence 0.61.
Use news_mins_4_pct_up to capture 4-minute build momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9209; SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Open-auction reversal when open gap faded quickly
results.description: If open gap exists but pct_5_min small, expect reversal: subtract(ts_zscore(news_open_gap),ts_zscore(news_pct_5_min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage mixed but acceptable; SUGGESTION4: filters ephemeral gaps. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Momentum with zscore scaling and winsorization
results.description: Winsorize pct_60min then ts_zscore to control for extremes. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: outlier control. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Small cap jump detection via mins to % up
results.description: Short minutes to big jumps in small caps: divide(reverse(ts_zscore(news_mins_5_chg)),news_cap). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: mins coverage 0.9671; SUGGESTION4: liquidity-exploit. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Post-news momentum scaled by provider (trusted sources)
results.description: Boost signal for certain providers using nws12_mainz_provider index (encoded numeric). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: provider is categorical so no vec_avg used; SUGGESTION3: provider coverage 0.9741; SUGGESTION4: filters trusted sources. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High prev-vol with low current momentum => fade
results.description: If prev_vol high (nws12_mainz_prev_vol) but current pct_30min small, mean-revert: subtract(ts_zscore(nws12_mainz_prev_vol),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: prev_vol coverage 0.9733; SUGGESTION4: volatility-aware fade. Confidence 0.48.

ts_rank(news_pct_30min,10) to find relative intraday acceleration vs history. SUGGESTION1: single field used for cross-time ranking; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: robust rank-based. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Fade very slow builds (many minutes to move 1%)
results.description: If it took many minutes to reach 1% up, prefer fade: ts_zscore(news_mins_1l,20) reversed. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.707; SUGGESTION4: interpretable fade. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Earnings surprise decayed by minutes to move
results.description: Divide eps_actual zscore by mins_1_chg to favor large surprise with quick reaction: divide(ts_zscore(news_eps_actual),add(1,news_mins_1_chg)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverages OK; SUGGESTION4: combines surprise and speed. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum persistence measured by ts_product over 3 intervals
results.description: Use product of signs of pct_1min, pct_5min, pct_30min via multiply of zscores to ensure consistent sign. SUGGESTION1: uses up to 3 fields but KEEP_IN_MIND limits 2 datafields â€” so use pct_1min and pct_30min only. SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverages high. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Volume surge with low ATR => reliable continuation
results.description: High curr_vol/mov_vol with low atr_ratio indicates liquidity-driven move: divide(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(divide(news_curr_vol,news_mov_vol),5)),add(1,news_atr_ratio)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: ratio backfilled; SUGGESTION4: liquidity-focus. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: EOD close momentum: pct_close vs ton_last
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_result1 (percent change to close) as momentum measure. SUGGESTION1: single high-coverage field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9733; SUGGESTION4: direct close-based drift. Confidence 0.63.

If pre_vwap deviates from prevclose, expect continuation into session: subtract(news_pre_vwap,news_prev_close) then ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: news_prev_close coverage 0.1728 (<0.6) so ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION4: pre-market edge. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Momentum vs short-led names (short squeeze potential)
results.description: High pct_30min and high short_interest => stronger continuation: multiply(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),ts_zscore(news_short_interest)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: short_interest coverage 0.872; SUGGESTION4: squeeze-aware. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High pre-news ticks then rapid decline => continuation down
results.description: Multiply tot_ticks zscore with reverse pct_5_min zscore to find tick-heavy sell-offs. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: both high coverage; SUGGESTION4: microstructure insight. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Momentum persistence measured by ts_rank of pct_120min
results.description: Use ts_rank(news_pct_120min,20) to find persistent intraday movers. SUGGESTION1: single field ranking over time; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: robust persistence indicator. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Fade when minute percent up counts are long (slow ramps)
results.description: If news_mins_20_chg small but pct_30min large, expect fade: subtract(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),ts_zscore(news_mins_20_chg)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: minutes coverage 0.9142; SUGGESTION4: captures slow ramps. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Post-news continuation for names with rising prev_vol
results.description: Use prev_vol growth (news_prev_vol) with pct_30min: multiply(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(news_prev_vol,5)),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: prev_vol coverage 0.0374 so severe backfill used; SUGGESTION4: cautious on sparse data. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Momentum constrained to non-extreme PE buckets
results.description: Trade momentum only for names with PE in moderate bucket using bucket() then multiply with pct_30min. SUGGESTION1: two fields (news_pe_ratio and pct_30min); SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: pe coverage high; SUGGESTION4: avoids extremes. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Short-term continuation for after-hours pre-news spikes
results.description: Use nws12_prez_30_seconds and nws12_prez_1_minute fields (pre-market moves) â€” but keep two: use nws12_prez_1_minute zscore. SUGGESTION1: single field chosen for coverage issues; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.4144 (<0.6) so apply ts_backfill; SUGGESTION4: targets pre-market spikes. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Earnings magnitude vs market cap (size-adjusted surprise)
results.description: Divide eps_actual zscore by sqrt(cap) to prefer large surprise in small firms. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: cap coverage high; SUGGESTION4: size-adjustment. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High 30-min move plus low prevday change => continuation
results.description: Multiply pct_30min zscore by inverse prevday vol (news_prevday) to emphasize new information. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: prevday coverage 0.7311; SUGGESTION4: filters stale movers. Confidence 0.52.

Use quantile(pe_ratio) to scale momentum: divide(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),quantile(news_pe_ratio)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: pe coverage high; SUGGESTION4: valuation scaling. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Microstructural reversal: high ticks with tiny price change
results.description: If tot_ticks high but pct_30min small, expect breakout or reversal; use subtract(ts_zscore(news_tot_ticks),ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: high coverage; SUGGESTION4: cautious signal. Confidence 0.46.

Multiply pct_30min zscore by sign(news_spy_last - news_spy_close) for market-aware trades. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: spy fields coverage ~0.97; SUGGESTION4: directional conditioning. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: EOD reversal after very high eodvwap vs ton_last
results.description: Reverse when eod_vwap far above ton_last: reverse(ts_zscore(divide(subtract(news_eod_vwap,news_ton_last),news_ton_last))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: high coverage; SUGGESTION4: classic take-profit. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by days since last change
results.description: Use days_from_last_change(news_ton_last) to downweight stale news: divide(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min),add(1,days_from_last_change(news_ton_last))). SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: ton_last coverage high; SUGGESTION4: freshness filter. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Post-news momentum with hump turnover control
results.description: Apply hump to pct_30min to limit turnover-driven noise: hump(ts_zscore(news_pct_30min)). SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: reduces turnover. Confidence 0.60.

High kurtosis in returns may indicate tail events; use ts_kurtosis(news_pct_30min,20) to detect names with fat tails and trade conservatively. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: risk filter. Confidence 0.45.

Winsorize vol_stddev and multiply with pct_30min zscore to avoid volatility spikes. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: vol coverage high; SUGGESTION4: robustification. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings momentum but exclude high PE extremes using bucket
results.description: Use bucket(pe_ratio) to mask extremes then multiply by pct_30min. SUGGESTION1: two fields; SUGGESTION2: n/a; SUGGESTION3: pe coverage high; SUGGESTION4: removes outliers. Confidence 0.56.
